QuestData.Title: Galaen's Journal - The Fate of Vindicator Saruan
QuestData.Description: Your hands tremble as you pick up the book. Kuros must be told about this tragedy. Return the book to him.
QuestData.LogDescription: Take Galaen's Journal to Vindicator Kuros at Blood Watch.
QuestData.CompletionText: What have you got there, $n? Is that a journal?
QuestData.RewardText: <Kuros' face turns pale as he reads the journal; tears stream down his face.>$B$BSaruan was my master... my teacher... my mentor... I took his place among the Triumvirate only recently - after we had given up searching for him.$B$B<Kuros' face contorts in anger.>$B$BMatis...
